thread:
Researchers introduce Quiet-STaR, an implicit reasoning method using text-generated rationales 🧠💡 #AIResearch #NLP
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2403.09629
Researchers have developed Quiet-STaR, an AI model trained on internet text for general reasoning. 🧠🌍 #AIAdvancements #GeneralReasoning
Drum roll 🥁 Improved zero-shot reasoning on CommonsenseQA and GSM8K with token count scaling. #AIAdvancements #MachineLearning
Researchers develop new AI method using parallel sampling, custom meta-tokens, and a mixing head to blend predictions with and without rationales. 🔬💡 #AIResearch #MachineLearning
Experimental results show Quiet-STaR improves token prediction and long thoughts boost reasoning. 🧠🚀 #AIResearch #ModelPerformance
